item.title: 'We're headed to a shutdown,' Vance says after Trump meeting with leaders ends
item.description: Democrats have insisted that any short-term funding deal to avoid a shutdown of the U.S. government include an extension of enhanced Obamacare subsidi...

item.title: Trump administration to expand coal leasing, fund coal plant upgrades
item.description: The U.S. will announce policies to encourage coal output, as the Trump administration seeks to reverse the decline of the fuel's use.

item.title: Watch: Trump details plan to end Israel war with Hamas in Gaza
item.description: Hamas has not agreed with the 20-point peace plan, which President Donald Trump discussed during remarks at the White House.

item.title: Democrats refuse to cave on health care before meeting with Trump on government shutdown
item.description: President Donald Trump and congressional leaders from both parties are set to meet at 3 p.m. for 11th hour talks.

item.title: Trump bashes Zohran Mamdani after Eric Adams drops out of New York mayor's race
item.description: Democratic nominee Zohran Mamdani has consistently led polls in the contest, where his strongest opponent is former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo.
